context: Does this have a twist access or not? On CH website, it says it has a three way axis, which makes me think it does, but some reviews say it doesn't.
response: No twist axis. It's a great joystick, rugged and reliable but a twist axis would be nice. Software is easy to use.

context: I have a SteelSeries 4HD mouse pad,would this work well with a plastic coated pad? I currently have a Naos 5000 that's getting worn out.

context: Is this mouse comfortable with large hands, i currently have a g600 and it just isn't comfortable for my meaty hands anymore....
response: We'll I have rather small hands and feel that accessing the buttons (all of them) would be easier with larger hands.  That being said, I'd say the mouse is larger in size than my Naga Razr which felt just about right in my little hand.

context: Does it work on the ps4?
response: The Audio does, the microphone requires a strange workaround for no particular reason. Razer support insists that it's "not compatible with the PS4" despite the product description "The Razer Kraken's 3.5mm combined audio jack is compatible with any device that accepts a 3.5mm input, allowing use across multiple devices.", but they also directed me to this customer-created workaround: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMiHbMWjF2E

context: Does this have a "rumble pak" built into it?

context: help when i use this it corrupts my data and i have to format how do i use this without that happening
response: 1. delete your file & create a new one (this usually works pretty good).2. try using fewer codes (if you use to many codes they start to do weird things).3. spend the extra money & invest in a gameshark (it's a much better product overall).

context: It seems like the other 1 in 1 PS2 component cables don't play PS1 games if hooked up to a HDTV.  So does this one do the job?
response: This works for the PS2 no matter what game you play on it. Unless you are asking if this hooks up to a PS1, it does not.

context: I just got a game with a DANCE MAT, and I want to make sure I am able to connect it to my Wii U. Will this work as well?
response: The mayflash allows you to play the Gamecube controller with the Wii U. Yes it will work for the Wii U. It was the only adapter out there I could find that would let u play the Gamecube controller with the Wii U. Until Nintendo came out with the new adapter. I hope this help's U

context: Will this run on Windows XP?
response: This game will run on XP. I installed it on my XP machine when I had it. It however will not run on Windows 7
